relevant_findings.description: erythematous fluctuating and painful monoarticular joint with marked functional impairment

imaging.conventional_radiographs: rarefaction and erosion of tibial and femoral metaphyses of the right knee
imaging.MRI: signs of synovitis and joint effusion

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After 2 weeks of therapy, symptoms at the right knee worsened and articular pain and local swelling at the left knee was observed.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Colliquative abscess of the right knee identified on MRI.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Condition is slowly worsening after 18 months of treatment.
